articles.content:
Formula 1 has confirmed this weekend's Emilia Romagna Grand Prix has been cancelled due to the disruption caused by persistent heavy rain in northern Italy.
It comes after Italy's Deputy Prime Minis… [+1443 chars]

articles.title: ‘At toss, Warner had said…’: Ex-India star makes huge ‘Ponting-Ganguly’ claim - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The former India all-rounder made a massive remark on Delhi Capitals' head coach role following the side's elimination from IPL 2023. | Cricket
articles.content: The Delhi Capitals were the first team to be eliminated from the race for playoffs in the 2023 Indian Premier League. The side faced a 31-run loss in its do-or-die match against Punjab Kings last wee… [+1995 chars]

articles.title: Bangladesh to host Afghanistan for a full tour in June-July 2023 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The visit will be broken into two parts though to allow Afghanistan to play a white-ball series in India
articles.content: Afghanistan and Bangladesh have played out some intense games in limited-overs cricket  •  ICC via Getty Images
